name: Respondent Solicitor Notice of Proceedings NOP RSE1 (court service inside UK)
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant: ((applicant name))
Respondent: ((respondent name))
Issue date: ((issueDate))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name))

A new ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)) application has been issued. You have been named as the respondent's solicitor. A response is due by ((date of response)).

^ Speak to your organisation's case access administrator (CAA) to make sure this case is assigned to you. You will not be able to access the case until you have been assigned.  

Respond to the application: ((signin url))

A notification and a copy of the ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)) application has also been sent you by post. 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: Response needed: ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)) application ((reference number))
